entry.title: Writeup Internal
entry.summary:
I-ENUMERATION.
Starting nmap with the given address of the machine with the following options:
sC : Equivalent to — script=default sV : Service Version scan Pn : No ping scan ( With this option, nmap continues to perform its function, as if the host is acti We get the following results :
We have an SSH running on port 22 that we should be able to abuse later on (maybe).

entry.title: Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything)

link.title: Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything)

entry.summary:
This is my journey of building an OS , from the lowest level to actual usage without any knowledge.
Who Am I :
NVM.
Why Am I building an OS ? (Just use one of the available ones already )
I’m not on the quest to build an OS for actual usage or to compete with Linux and Windows.
I’m trying to build an OS for the simple reason of learning how every line of code works on the lowest level of t...

entry.title: Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything) PART II

link.title: Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything) PART II

entry.summary:
The part where I pretend to know things that I don’t.
Since you all requested I go through the agony of working on this , in this part we will be attempting to write some words on the screen and pretend everything is going as planned.
Goal: Make our previously silent boot sector print some text
After the great accomplishment of creating our first boot sector and trying it first hand , some s...

entry.title: Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything) PART III

link.title: Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything) PART III

entry.summary:
Building An Actual OS (Without knowing anything) PART III
the worst part so far.
This part will be about memory.
Goal: Learn how the computer memory is organized.
We said earlier how the CPU fetches and executes instructions from memory, and how it was BIOS that loaded our 512-byte boot sector into memory and then, having finished its initialisations, told the CPU to jump to the start of ou...
